Node.definition: = causative action by which deities, humans, or animals bring an activity to full completion
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

Node.gloss: to approach|to come near|to draw near|to come forward
Node.definition: = action by which humans move to a location closer to a point of reference
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to separate oneself|to defect|to sequester oneself
Node.definition: = action by which humans disassociate themselves from a group of people

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state in which an event is considered utterly wrong and detestable
= descendant of Canaan (כְּנַעַן) son of Ham (חָם) son of Noah (נֹחַ) and inhabitant of the country named after them
= member of ethnic group inhabiting Canaan (כְּנַעַן) before arrival of Israelites (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ◄ regarded as descendants of Heth (חֵת)
= member of ethnic group; ◄ original inhabitants of Canaan (כְּנַעַן)
= inhabitant of Jebus (יְבוּס) ◄ original inhabitants of Canaan (כְּנַעַן)
= inhabitant of Ammon (עַמֹּון)
= inhabitant of Moab (מֹואָב)
= descendant or inhabitant of Mizraim (מִצְרַיִם) (Egypt)
= member of ethnic group; ◄ original inhabitants of Canaan (כְּנַעַן)
literally: to take a wife (for oneself); hence: = action by which a man contracts a marriage with a woman for himself
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= action by which humans join in or associate other humans; used to describe the combinations of different groups of peoples, suggesting social and religious confusion
= group of people that consider themselves descendants of one single ancestor
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= a person of authority
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

Node.gloss: to tear|to rend|to cut|to rip|to split
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or animals rip apart the human body or an inanimate object, either in part of entirely; usually with their hands

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= generic designation for any article of clothing

= long garment, hanging down to the ankles, ◄ usually made of wool, ► and worn over the tunic (כֻּתֹּנֶת) it is not clear whether it had sleeves or not, nor whether it was open or closed in the front; ≈ certain attitudes and emotions are often described in terms of such a garment, e.g. he wore fury like a robe
= the fine thread like strands growing from the skin of humans and certain animals

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= a growth of hair on the chin and lower cheeks of a mature man’s face, ≈ the absence of which is regarded as shameful
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity
= process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war
= process by which humans shake or tremble violently and involuntarily, ◄ caused by fear or another unnerving experience
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= a group of people who have been forcibly taken from their land to another
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= an offering consisting of grain or a grain product, which usually accompanies an animal sacrifice

= the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed
= an offering consisting of grain or a grain product, which usually accompanies an animal sacrifice

= the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed

Node.gloss: to tear|to rend|to cut|to rip|to split
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or animals rip apart the human body or an inanimate object, either in part of entirely; usually with their hands
= generic designation for any article of clothing

= long garment, hanging down to the ankles, ◄ usually made of wool, ► and worn over the tunic (כֻּתֹּנֶת) it is not clear whether it had sleeves or not, nor whether it was open or closed in the front; ≈ certain attitudes and emotions are often described in terms of such a garment, e.g. he wore fury like a robe
literally: to go down on (one's) knees; hence: = action by which humans kneel down in order to show respect
= central area of the leg where the thigh is joined to the lower leg; ≈ associated with stability and strength
= action by which humans or animals spread out part of their body

Node.gloss: to spread out one's hands > to pray
Node.definition: literally: to spread out or lift up one's palms; hence: = to present one's prayer and supplication before God by showing him one's empty hands
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= state in which humans experience a feeling of shame, as a result of their own actions or because of what other have done
= causative process by which humans take an object from a relatively low position and raise it up
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= state of being responsible for an unlawful deed, that was committed either knowingly or unknowingly
= process by which events increase in intensity
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= indirect male progenitor
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse, including those associated to him or her
= state of being responsible for an unlawful deed, that was committed either knowingly or unknowingly
= state in which an event has a high intensity
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse, including those associated to him or her
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression
= state in which people, animals or objects have been forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile
= all sorts of goods, taken forcibly from an enemy in war
= state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place
= relatively low frequency of events or short duration of an event
= a very short length of time
= state of experiencing an emotion of compassion towards other people; ► which is usually translated into action
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= small, pointed object ► driven into a wall or the ground and used for hanging things on or securing something in place; ≈ associated with firmness and security
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals

Node.gloss: to cause to shine|to give light to|to light up|radiant|resplendent
Node.definition: = action that causes something to emit or to reflect light; ≈ associated with well being and wisdom

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= process by which humans become more confident and hopeful than they were before, ◄ as if their courage comes back to life
= pertaining to happening with a low intensity
= state in which one is a slave or treated as such

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse, including those associated to him or her
= state in which one is a slave or treated as such
= action by which animals, humans, or deities suspend their commitment to (other) objects, animals, humans, or deities, either temporarily or permanently
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
literally: to stretch out (one's hand and hold out before someone); hence: = causative action by which deities cause good things to happen to humans as an act of kindness

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a nation and its territory, which was greatly expanded during the reign of Cyrus (כֹּורֶשׁ) I.
= process by which humans become more confident and hopeful than they were before, ◄ as if their courage comes back to life
literally: to lift up; hence: = causative action by which humans restore a building in its previous condition

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which a land, building, or town has been totally destroyed, ► to the extent that nobody can live there anymore

= a continuous vertical structure, usually made of natural stones, that encloses or divides an area of land; ≈ associated with security; in some cases used figuratively to denote integrity, which can be negatively affected by sin

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which humans or deities suspend their commitment to a certain pattern of behavior
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: by the hand (of someone); hence: = process by which a certain event is carried out by an intermediary (person) or instrument (object)

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to a group of male (and female) participants that are addressed if a discourse
= action by which humans take ownership of land and other possessions

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state in which objects are considered impure because of their association with evil practices
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= state in which objects are considered impure because of their association with evil practices

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state in which an event is considered utterly wrong and detestable
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= state or process by which a location is dominated by a certain event, to the extent that it dominates everything else, ◄ as if it were completely filled with that event
= the furthest or most extreme part of something
= the furthest or most extreme part of something

= something that causes humans, animals, or objects to be regarded by the law as having been contaminated, as a result of which anything that touches them may become contaminated as well; ► humans, animals, and objects that are unclean cannot participate in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
literally: to take a wife (for oneself); hence: = action by which a man contracts a marriage with a woman for himself
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= causative action by which humans make an effort to ensure that a certain event takes place
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

Node.gloss: to be strong|to prevail|to overcome|to overpower
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are strong in a physical, political, or military sense, or simply in their ability to convince others with words
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= objects that are considered of a good quality and attractive to the eye

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= causative action by which humans transfer the ownership of land and other possessions to the next generation
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong
= state of being responsible for an unlawful deed, that was committed either knowingly or unknowingly
= state in which an event has a high intensity
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an event to happen with less intensity
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

Node.gloss: to intermarry|to make a marriage alliance
Node.definition: = action by which humans contract affinity by intermarriage with another person or community
= state in which an event is considered utterly wrong and detestable
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

= process by which deities or humans experience an emotion of anger; ◄ caused by someone else's behavior ► almost invariably resulting in punishment for the party that is responsible, and almost exclusively used with God as the subject
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= literally: to finish; hence: = causative action by which humans and deities cause (other) humans and objects to completely disappear from existance

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state of being responsible for an unlawful deed, that was committed either knowingly or unknowingly

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
